    • isInstantiable

      public static boolean isInstantiable(Class<?> fieldType)
      Determines if the specified class type is instantiable.

      This method checks if the given class type is not an interface and not an abstract class, indicating that instances of the class can be created.

      Parameters:
      fieldType - the class type to check
      Returns:
      true if the class type is instantiable, false otherwise
